resources.string: Messages, Voice Calls & Video Calls without Internets
Welcome to AndroCom! Please enter your first and last name to get started.
Messages are end-to-end encrypted via Advanced Encryption Standard.

AndroCom Application License Agreement

 This AndroCom Application License Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into by and between Malik Umer, Ahmed, Muhammad, Harris, and Wasia (hereinafter collectively referred to as "Developers") and you (hereinafter referred to as "User" or "You") for the use of the AndroCom mobile application (hereinafter referred to as "Application").


 1. License Grant
 Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, the Developers hereby grant you a worldwide, royalty-free, non-exclusive, perpetual (for the duration of applicable international laws) license to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Application.


 2. Limitations
 You agree that the Application is provided "as is", without warranty of any kind, express or implied, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. In no event shall the Developers or copyright holders be liable for any claim, damages, or other liability, whether in an action of contract, tort, or otherwise, arising from, out of, or in connection with the Application or the use or other dealings in the Application.


 3. Attribution
 You agree to retain all copyright notices and license information pertaining to the Application and any modifications made to it.


 4. Governing Law
 This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the international laws, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.


 5. Termination
 The license granted herein shall automatically terminate if you violate any of the terms and conditions of this Agreement. Upon termination, you must immediately cease all use of the Application and destroy any copies of the Application in your possession.


 6. Severability
 If any provision of this Agreement is held to be unenforceable or invalid, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.


 7. Entire Agreement
 This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between you and the Developers regarding the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior or contemporaneous agreements, representations, warranties, and understandings.


 By installing, accessing, or using the AndroCom Application, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this Agreement.


 Effective Date: February 13, 2024
